TopicTitle: Can kerbal steps be converted to km around kerbals home planet ?

Articles.Content: Edited October 29, 2015 by roarke
One human step measure ... One kerbal step measure ... How many in km around the kerbal planet ?
So you want to figure out how many Kerbal steps are a meter, than make it in to km and find out the circumference of Kerbin by walking? The circumference is 3769.91 km
Any one tried to walk from A to A again to see on foot how much time it will get in kerbal time or our real approximately time ? Beside the time for standing and resting your hand on the keyboard.
It has taken people mouths to drive around Kerbin. It would take a very long time walk
